column1: Kata Robata////The best sushi/ sashimi in Houston and comparable to anything nationwide.  I always make a stop here when in town. My favorite is the sashimi for two.  Comes on a huge plate with real grated wasabi. The fish selection varies and depends on the chef
column2: but it never ceases to amaze me. The pieces are just the right size and melt in your mouth with a delicate taste that is just right and not overpowering. If it comes with raw shrimp
column3: make sure to ask them to fry the heads as a perfect end to the meal. We usually get the sushi uni a la carte. Always prepared perfectly and delightfully addicting. When getting the sushi
column4: the fish is complemented with rice that is seasoned just right and cooked to perfection where each grain is distinct yet sticky. This is the place for true sushi lovers.
